sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has confirmed that counter-offensive actions are underway against Russian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: He made the comments during a press conference with visiting Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. At least three people have been killed and more than two dozen wounded in a drone attack on the Black Sea port of Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A block of flats took the brunt of the blast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile the last operating reactor at the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant has been put into cold shutdown, both as a precautionary measure and because nearby shelling had damaged the lines connecting it to Ukraine's energy system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The suspect in Thursday's stabbing attack in the French town of Annecy has been charged with attempted murder.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The move came after psychiatrists said the 31-year-old Syrian refugee was fit to face charges.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Four children and two adults were injured in the attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Annecy district court today opened a ouvert une information judiciaire des chefs de tentatives d'assassinat et de rébellion avec arme.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Deux juges d'instruction du tribunal judiciaire d'Annecy ont été co-saisis.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Le parquet a requis son placement en détention provisoire.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Il a été présenté ce matin à deux juges d'instruction qui l'ont mis en examen de ses chefs d'inculpation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Et il n'a pas souhaité s'exprimer devant ces magistrats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Le président Emmanuel Macron a rencontré des victimes et des premiers répondants le dimanche.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Les vies de ceux qui ont été blessés ne sont plus pensées être en danger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Four indigenous children who disappeared 40 days ago after surviving a plane crash in the Amazon jungle were found alive on Friday, ending an intense search that gripped the nation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Colombia's president said the four siblings, aged 13, 9, 4 and 11 months, were alone when searchers found them and are now receiving medical attention.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The frantic search began on the 1st of May, after a single-engine propeller plane carrying six passengers crashed due to engine failure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: One hundred and fifty soldiers from Colombia's army led the search efforts, supported by dozens of volunteers from indigenous tribes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ted Kaczynski, the Harvard-educated killer who was known as the Unabomber, has died in prison aged 81.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Kaczynski ran a bombing campaign between 1978 and 1995 that killed three people and injured 23 others.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The hunt for the unknown perpetrator traumatized the United States, with the FBI giving him the name the Unabomber because he targeted universities and airlines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Italian special forces have regained control of a Turkish cargo ship that had been attacked by stowaways.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The special forces lowered themselves onto the ship from two helicopters in the dramatic

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: operation off the southern city of Naples.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: About 15 stowaways had moved to take control of the ship after they were discovered but the captain was able to raise the alarm before being overcome Poland's world number one eager Swantek has won the French Open in Paris defeating unseated Karina Mukova from Czechia in a tense three-set contest 6-2, 5-7, 6-4.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: At 22, Swantek becomes the youngest player to win three Roland Garros titles since Monika Seles 30 years ago. In the men's final on Sunday, Norway's Kasper Rud will face Serbia's Novak Djokovic.
